body: 我拷贝了同事的echarts,zrender后正常使用了
我也找了好久。。。。

[zrender-v3.5.1.zip](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/files/1456837/zrender.zip)
[echarts-v3.6.2.zip](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/files/1456840/echarts.zip)

[echarts3.7.2.zip](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/files/1456858/echarts3.7.2.zip)
这是版本3.7.2的，里面有两个包，都需要放入node_modules。急需要用的，可以先下载用用，随后应该会修复bug 。
什么时间修复呀，在线等，快下班了。
本地环境指定版本可以，但是测试环境走jenkins发布，用jenkins发布完还是不行。

在package.json的依赖中 把版本号改为以下的 ，可以指定3.7版本 临时解决一下。 
```
"echarts": "https://registry.npmjs.org/echarts/-/echarts-3.7.2.tgz",
 "zrender": "https://registry.npmjs.org/zrender/-/zrender-3.6.3.tgz"
```

ps:这种版本升级，应该在3上面加1吧？大版本升级 :doge:。
指定echarts和zrender版本分别为3.7.2和3.6.2可以

在package.json的依赖中 把版本号改为以下的 ，可以指定3.7版本 临时解决一下。 
```
"echarts": "https://registry.npmjs.org/echarts/-/echarts-3.7.2.tgz",
 "zrender": "https://registry.npmjs.org/zrender/-/zrender-3.6.3.tgz"
```

在package.json的依赖中 把版本号改为以下的 ，可以指定3.7版本 临时解决一下。 
```
"echarts": "https://registry.npmjs.org/echarts/-/echarts-3.7.2.tgz",
 "zrender": "https://registry.npmjs.org/zrender/-/zrender-3.6.3.tgz"
```

今天更新项目，也遇到同样的问题  
Uncaught TypeError: Path.extend is not a function

data里面把时间一起写进入去格式类似于
```
series: {
  type: 'line'
  data: [
    [时间, 值],
    [时间, 值],
]
}
```

然后某些时间点没有数据的,后面有数据就会连接过去了
echarts 好坑。。

echart 3.6.2   zrender  3.5.2  重新install  查看node_module，如果有其他版本的echart或者render，就删掉保留3.6.2和3.5.2的版本

我这里临时解决方案是把 `echarts` 写死成 `3.7.2`，然后在 dependencies 里面添加一个：

```
"zrender": "3.6.3"
```

最终的样子是这样的：

```
"echarts": "3.7.2",
"zrender": "3.6.3",
```

In any case, many thanks for the great work on this library.
请尽快解决一下，这种问题应该不难解决的
建议先回滚， 最新版本 就当没发出来

@aeolusheath  @ucanlendit 

The new version of echarts(v3.8.0) and its dependencies zrender(v3.7.0)  change his module loading grammer from CommonJs(eg: require('xxx')) to esModule(eg: import xxx from 'xxx'). Some old module bundler like webpack(v1.0) can't correct bundle esModule, so raise error. You can try below solution: 

**solution 1: lock the low version echarts and zrender**
low version echarts and zrender use the CommonJs to loader module. Old version module bundle can auto recognize it and bundle. 
Edit package-lock.json(will auto generate when npm >= v5.0), 
Change 
```
"echarts": {
      "version": "3.8.0",
      "resolved": "http://registry.npm.taobao.org/echarts/download/echarts-3.2.3.tgz",
      "integrity": "sha1-TwHhW/2jNS/NjvkEnxPYRIlxolg=",
      "requires": {
        "zrender": "3.7.0"
      }
    },
```
To 
```
"echarts": {
      "version": "3.2.3",
      "resolved": "http://registry.npm.taobao.org/echarts/download/echarts-3.2.3.tgz",
      "integrity": "sha1-TwHhW/2jNS/NjvkEnxPYRIlxolg=",
      "requires": {
        "zrender": "3.1.3"
      }
    },
````
And change
```
"zrender": {
      "version": "3.7.0",
      "resolved": "http://registry.npm.taobao.org/zrender/download/zrender-3.1.3.tgz",
      "integrity": "sha1-RFiX5ApDGkIk7w5xNXxh4tdJfIw="
    }
```
To
```
"zrender": {
      "version": "3.1.3",
      "resolved": "http://registry.npm.taobao.org/zrender/download/zrender-3.1.3.tgz",
      "integrity": "sha1-RFiX5ApDGkIk7w5xNXxh4tdJfIw="
    }
```
than `rm -rf node_modules && npm install`

**solution 2: Enforce install the low version echarts and zrender**
directly:`npm install echarts@3.2.3 && npm install zrender@3.1.3` 
Just a temporary solution.

**solution3: update your module bundler(eg: use webpack2.0 or webpack3.0 instead webpack1.0)**
@lgl1993  写定后将原本的node_modules删除， 然后再`npm install`， 理论上是可以的
我是用了vue-echarts这个包时报错，查看报错以及node_modules时发现包依赖的echarts的/lib 目录下都是空的，于是我安装了低版本的echarts，用旧版本的lib/整个替换新版本的lib/，然后就正常启动了
我也出现了这个问题，找到 \node_modules\.2.5.0@vue-echarts\node_modules\echarts下的lib\目录，用旧版本的lib\替换掉

@YuyangGong thank you for the advice solution 2 worked great! We use eCharts with Gatsby.js so will have to wait until gatsby 2.0 comes out with Webpack3.0 for a long term solution. 

Again, thank you for the quick response.
今天上线差点被坑，感谢 @PerseveranceZ
换了版本，重新install也不行呀，我用的yarn，希望尽快解决，十分感谢！！

I had the same problem, I fixed it by changing my import from:
```
import echarts from 'echarts';
```
to:
```
import { init } from 'echarts';
```

Also in my webpack config DefinePlugin section I had to set:
```
__DEV__: true,
```

(and false for prod build)

This bug is affecting mobile only. On desktop this is fine. Whenever you try to interact with a chart on mobile via touch, your "mouse" co-ordinates are offset. So a click at a certain point actually hits another area of the chart. 

As mentioned by another user, this issue did affect desktop but was fixed on #3635. I believe DPI calculations are the reason it is still affecting mobile. It is difficult to interact with charts on mobile until this issue is fixed because trying to click on a bar always highlights a different bar.

Issue found on version 3.7.2

https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/issues/293
@Stupidism sorry,it's 3.7.1 or 3.7.2

临时解决方案：
1. 引入echarts的地方改为
```
import * as echarts from 'echarts'
```
2. webpack的DefinePlugin里加入如下字段
```
// 此处根据情况自行修改，结果为boolean就行，true的情况下会多一些日志信息
'__DEV__': process.env.node_env === 'dev' 
```

或者
`npm un echarts && npm i -E echarts@3.7.2 zrender@3.6.3`

```
ERROR in ./node_modules/echarts/src/util/graphic.js
Module not found: Error: Can't resolve 'zrender/graphic/shape/BezierCurve' in 'F:\test\node_modules\echarts\src\util'
 @ ./node_modules/echarts/src/util/graphic.js 43:26-70
```

QQ1：599316527
QQ2：474021406
解决方案见： https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/7000

@coldice945 CI的话，
1. package.json中指定版本号基本是可以的
2. package-lock.json中lock版本。
3. 以上都不行，但是事情比较紧急？ 那修改CI相应的yml配置文件吧，
比如
```
run unit test:
  stage: unit-test
  script:
    - npm install
    - npm run unit
```
修改为
```
run unit test:
  stage: unit-test
  script:
    - npm install
    - npm install echarts@3.6.2
    - npm install zrender@3.5.2
    - npm run unit
```
给大佬们递临时解决方案：https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/7000#issuecomment-343360074

官方的api有 echartsInstance.clear 
清空当前实例，会移除实例中所有的组件和图表。清空后调用 getOption 方法返回一个{}空对象。
我碰到的是用ajax请求的到json数据后去更新series中的数据,但是我把实例和Option都声明成全局变量,就会报这样的错.都放在ajax函数里就不报错了.也是奇怪.

同被坑，昨天几个项目代码更新，CI一跑，项目全挂了，希望引起重视啊。

比较尴尬

```sh
$ cat node_modules/echarts/package.json| grep version
  "version": "3.7.2",

$ cat node_modules/vue-echarts/node_modules/echarts/package.json | grep version
  "version": "3.8.0",
```

我写死了使用 echarts@3.7.x 但是 vue-echarts 写的是 `"echarts": "^3.7.2",`

建议可以配置一下`package.json`的`main/module/browser`字段，这样可以规避这个问题：

```js
  "main": "build/echarts.js",
  "browser": "build/echarts.min.js",
  "module": "index.js",
```

这样的话还可以保留`index.js`里的es6的写法。另外，不配置`main`字段还有个风险，目前托管`npm`包的`CDN`服务 https://unpkg.com 是会读`package.json`的`main`字段的，这个字段指向的文件必须符合`UMD`标准：
 https://unpkg.com/echarts

@100pah

```sh
cnpm i echarts@3.7.2 zrender@3.6.3

# zrender
cd node_modules/echarts/node_module
ln -snf ../../_zrender@3.6.3@zrender ./zrender
```
